name: Hpi_address_type
title: OrgFac Address Type
description: A coded type for organisation/facility address.

concept.definition: This is the address that is used for mailing information (a postal address may be used in this field).
The address of the business used for administrative purposes.
Physical location where health services are provided including practitioners preferred service delivery address.
An address that is both physical and postal.

purpose: A coded type for organisation/facility address.
